title: Colin Cowherd's Instant Reaction - Steelers/Dolphins SNF + Week 7 Instant Reaction
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd's Instant Reaction - Steelers/Dolphins SNF + Week 7 Instant Reaction
description:
Colin gives his instant reaction to the Dolphins outlasting the Steelers for a SNF win, and explains why he’s more bullish on Tua and Mike McDaniel than Kenny Pickett under Mike Tomlin. He also gives his top Week 7 takes, including why he’s not surprised at the Packers unraveling, and why San Francisco is still a Super Bowl threat despite a rough loss to the Chiefs in Christian McCaffrey’s debut.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
